title: Can you make cc get delayed until a non interruptible dash ends?
body:
So, for example, a talon E if he gets stunned mid-air he doesn't get his jump canceled so if for example, a Xerath stuns him at close range mid-air he pretty much didn't do anything because it would expire before talon lands

Also the same for Sejuani's E if she is rooted mid air she doesn't stop static but continues and the dash is a little bit slow so it can take a huge portion of a root if it hit her mid-air

What I want is that if she is hit mid-air the root would start when she arrives at the destination instead of starting right away

Thoughts?

replies.body: I'd prefer they just make every hard CC ground the target, forcing them to stop mid-dash.

> [{quoted}](name=Devilangel6161,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bk8Gqd2a,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-03-24T12:57:48.144+0000)
>
> Doesn't work if they have buffered the dash to avoid it.  It's like saying "just don't cast the cc until ezreal arcane shifts or tristana rocket jumps"

If your opponent is unstoppable or casting a dash and you then decide to CC them, that's your mistake. If you use a CC spell and then your opponent uses an unstoppable effect or casts a dash in reaction to that, they successfully countered your spell.

If you launch a damaging attack and your opponent uses a shield before the attack hits, should the damage be delayed until the shield wears off, too?

This is a different example, you can cc a tristana mid jump, just not while she preparing her jump. If you're playing a support with cc, wait until she's up a millimeter then cc her. (Except for like Lux q)

Tbh I don't agree with this, ccs duration should start at the point of contact cause that's when it hits. 
Think of these in terms of inertia, if you bound midway through a Calvary (or boar) charge your gunna keep going for a bit.  Though if talon hasn't got to the top of the wall his ass should fall down to the side of the wall he was on cause of much the same logic.

Actually, what happens (depending on the cc) they get stopped mid air (for example, talon jumping and lissandra ulting him. He will be frozen mid jump). So there are some dashes that are stopped mid way.

Lissandra ult isn't just a stun, it's a knockdown as well (knockdown is a CC effect that immediately stops dashes).

It's an instantaneous CC effect that only Lissandra R, Ashe R, Camille R (sorta), Malzahar R, Poppy W (unnoticeable due to knockup), Jinx E, Veigar E and Viktor W possess.

It's akin to an instantaneous grounding effect, like Singed's and Cass's.

---

So for your example, Lissandra is one of the very few who can actually do that. Any other champion with a straight up stun would not stop him mid dash.
No cc can stop my Fiora from lunging in and blade waltz to get penta kill
